name: Flasktastic (Minigame 14)
description:
Minigame 14 | 2021-02-12

  • Made during a 3-hour Friday morning stream (follow me on Twitch to catch my next minigame stream).
  • Written in JavaScript and C99 compiled to WASM (learn how you can do this with a simplified example here).
  • Keyboard, touch, and gamepad support.

Play on joshpowlison.com/minigames and log in with your Twitch account to compete for high scores and use your avatar from my channel!
